name: Pokémon Conquerors
summary: The Ransei Region is divided into kingdoms for each elemental type, and these are at constant war. Nobunaga the Warlord of the dragon kingdom of the North has the ambition to conquer all Ransei to destroy it, and you, the protagonist Warlord of Aurora must find a way to stop him by forming your army.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Pokemon Conquerors - Fan-made Game For Pokemon Conquest Fan with RPG Game Style in the Ransei Region
